Reviews.Title: “Low level three star experience”
Reviews.Author: Olderguy
Reviews.Content: location fine easy reach san marco etc hotel limited structure history lift walk stairs ours pics double bed bathroom size wardrobe modern fittings plenty hot water etc air con fine breakfast limited adequate breakfast wait mornings table free staff pleasant helpful clean star stayed europe basics price represented value

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel, great location, rooms VERY small and pricey.”
Reviews.Author: MAkutner
Reviews.Content: location hotel spot able wander main touristy venice staff friendly polite daytime manager speaks excellent english youll translation guide evening staff helpful providing maps suggestions store luggage checked sightsee little little wont unless youre sleeping brushing teeth pretty 5 feet internet slow actually pay hour time check emails breakfast adequate rolls cereal fruit nice clean hotel location 149 euros little expected pay amenities provided

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience and fabulous location”
Reviews.Author: Sandy-Ross
Reviews.Content: wonderful surprise window looked canal gondolas leading straight grand canal real treat listening gondoliers morning setting day 16th century palazzo plush walls period decor breakfast excellent service downfall lift couple blocks piazza san marco centre historic city shops restaurants nearby

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: anna_vish_10
Reviews.Content: stayed friend august 2 nights hotel steps piazza san marco literally canal didnt view expensive paid 90 location mentioned absolutely amazing clean walkin closet tiny little bathroom attached complaints didnt stay except sleep service service excellent favour breakfast 5am morning food mediocre dry breakfast hot beverages note elevator hotel stairs steep mobility issues stay id definately price location
